title: Help? Any suggestions for a sans serif to go with Zapf Elliptical/Melior?
content:
Hi. Looking for an elegant sans serif that will go well with Melior – mainly interested in the superellipse shape. Any suggestions most appreciate. Ta!

comments.content: Well, Eurostile Condensed has the superellipse. As long as you don't need to use a lot of the sans in small text, you should be just fine!
